skills.Name: From Fire

skills.Name: Strike Storm

skills.Name: Crippling Tsunami
skills.Description: Deals medium Ice damage to all enemies (1 hit). Applies Slow for 3 turns. Consumes Earth, Lightning, and Fire Stains for greatly increased damage.

skills.Name: Crustal Crush

skills.Name: Earth Rising

skills.Name: Electrify

skills.Description: Deals extreme damage to all enemies (8 hits). Each hit deals damage in a random element. Can only be cast with Lightning, Earth, Fire, and Ice Stains.

skills.Name: Elemental Trick
skills.Description: Deals low single-target Ice, Fire, Lightning, and Earth damage (4 hits). Critical Hits generate the corresponding Stain.

skills.Name: Healing Light
skills.Description: Heals the targeted ally and dispels Status Effects. Consumes Earth Stain: costs 0 AP.

skills.Name: Hell
skills.Description: Deals very high Fire damage that applies 5 Burn per hit to all enemies (2 hits). Deals self-damage if failed. Consumes Ice, Earth, and Lightning Stains for greatly increased damage.

skills.Name: Ice Lance
skills.Description: Deals medium single-target Ice damage that Slows the target (1 hit). Consumes Earth Stain for increased damage.

skills.Name: Immolation
skills.Description: Deals low single-target Fire damage and applies 3 Burn (1 hit). Applies 2 more Burns if the target is Marked. Consumes Ice Stain for increased damage.

skills.Name: Lightning Dance
skills.Description: Deals very high single-target Lightning damage (6 hits). Critical Hits trigger an additional hit. Consumes Earth, Ice, and Fire Stains for greatly increased damage.

skills.Name: Mayhem

skills.Name: Rebirth
skills.Description: Revives an ally with 30–70% Health and 2 additional AP. Consumes Lightning Stains: costs 0 AP.

skills.Name: Revitalization

skills.Name: Rockslide

skills.Name: Sky Break

skills.Name: Terraquake

skills.Name: Thermal Transfer
skills.Description: Deals low single-target Ice damage (2 hits). Gains 4 AP if the target is Burning. Consumes Earth Stains to play a second turn.

skills.Name: Thunderfall
skills.Description: Deals medium Lightning damage to random enemies (2–6 hits). Critical Hits trigger an additional hit. Consumes Fire Stain for increased damage.

skills.Name: Tree of Life

skills.Name: Tremor

skills.Name: Typhoon
